text: & g Problem 4 (4 marks) Find the unique solution of the equation $y' =1 - y*2$, $y(0)=0$. Plot the solution over the interval $0 \leq t \leq 3$. In particular, create a vector of $200$ equally spaced $t$ values from $t=0$ to $t=3$. Save the vector as t4. Create the vector of corresponding $y$ values of the unique solution. Save the vector as y4.
